attributes.action: There should be a general election when there is a change of prime minister.
attributes.additional_details: It must become consitutional to hold a general election when the party leader changes of the political party that is the government in office.
attributes.background: The mandate should be only valid to the party wirh the party leader that won the general election so we never have an unelected prime minister again.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/620016
